name: gamevault
tagline: A self-hosted game launcher and library manager for organizing local collections
description: GameVault is a self-hosted gaming launcher and library manager. It scans games, provides metadata, launch buttons, and remote play support. Supports Windows and Linux builds, with a slick UI for organizing your collection.

features.title: Game Library Management
features.description: Organize and catalog your game collection with automatic metadata and artwork retrieval

features.title: Remote Launcher
features.description: Launch games remotely from any device with cross-platform Windows and Linux support

features.title: Metadata Enrichment
features.description: Automatically fetch game details, cover art, and descriptions for your library

features.title: Remote Play
features.description: Stream and play games from your server with built-in remote play capabilities

features.title: Cross
features.description: Deploy on Windows or Linux with native builds for both operating systems

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Browse your game library through a polished, modern web interface

features.title: Automatic Scanning
features.description: Detect and index games from configured directories with minimal manual input

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Centralize your gaming collection in a self-hosted platform with full control
